197 comments, plenty of people have asked but no one have yet to answer clearly:

Do I need to install "Battle For Middle Earth II" before this expansion, or is that game (BFMEII) included in this torrent?
why is the piratebay tracker offline (timed out) ?

Here's the problem with ALL KNOWN currently circulating "cracks" for both BFME2 and the ROWK expansion: They don't work for multiplayer LAN games. This is because the protection hasn't been properly cracked because the guys who reversed the .exe didn't take into account (or test) the protection of the games in a MP LAN environment! So what happens is that every time the game starts, a random "garbage version number" is assigned (one of the protections they missed) to the running game. This results in the inability to start a LAN game because of the error "version mismatch".

Just try running the game with the cracked .exe and go to setup menu, you'll notice version numbers like "0.1634714321, 0.012957432" etc.. Bummer. We've solved it with mini-images and daemon-tools + anti-blacklisting software of SecuROM. By the way what files need to be changed so that we don't have to install the game "fresh" on all the machines?

For everyone trying to get this game working on lan listen up:

*with the cracked game.dat the game randomly generates a version number (which you can see at the options screen) so then when you go to play lan you have a version mismatch with your firends

To get around this follow these steps:

1) Make sure you have the uncracked game.dat
2) Download the maxi image here:
http://www.slaidesblatfest.com/index.php?option=com_remository&Itemid=6&func=fileinfo&id=19
3) Mount with Dameon Tools
4) Use YASU to hide the virtual drive
5) Enjoy the game

****For all who experience the splash screen then crash****

You must put the options.ini(Create a Txt file) into
C:\Users\username\appdata\roaming\my lord of the rings the rise of the witch king or my battle for middle earth(tm) II files

In the txt file copy and paste this into it

AudioLOD = High
FlashTutorial = 0
HasSeenLogoMovies = yes
IdealStaticGameLOD = High
Resolution = 1024 768
StaticGameLOD = High
SuppressCahPromo = false
TimesInGame = 0

Game will start with update and crack now flawlessly

hey , a message come up saying please insert correct CD-Rom ?

1. Extract rar file.
2. Open Daemon Tools
3.  Right Clikc on Task Bar Icon > Virtual Devices > Device 0 H: No media > Mount Image
4. Locate iso and mount
5. Install game using 7frr-p794-5mgc-x5mc-grld  but do no run yet.
6. Go to My Computer and Right click + open CD
8. Richt click on BFME2 desktop icon and open file location.
7. Open folder titled crack and copy game.dat to the game directory (the folder you just opened) to replace existing file.
8. Play game.
9. If you have a high resolution then it may crash at the splash screen.

This was the solution for me:
http://lordoftherings.filefront.com/file/Windows_7_64bit_Battle_for_MiddleEarth_fix;116738x#2049823

Readme File:
Put the options.ini in your
My Battle for middle-earth 2 files

That should make your BFME 2 work with windows 7 64-bit
Atleast it worked for me :)

PS: You need to have the "Show hidden files" option on to find the folder

Just type to help section "hidden files"

PSS:
The My battle for middle-earth 2 files- folder is in:
C:/users/(your user name)/AppData/Roaming
